body_html:
@rmlarsen, could you comment on this. I feel like you haven't allowed this since it would make an ambiguity between batch and non batch forms of matrix multiply.

Also, your example is not "plain nice matrix multiplication". It is left-side vector multiplication of a matrix with an implicit broadcast.
body_text:
@rmlarsen, could you comment on this. I feel like you haven't allowed this since it would make an ambiguity between batch and non batch forms of matrix multiply.
Also, your example is not "plain nice matrix multiplication". It is left-side vector multiplication of a matrix with an implicit broadcast.
body:
@rmlarsen, could you comment on this. I feel like you haven't allowed this since it would make an ambiguity between batch and non batch forms of matrix multiply.

Also, your example is not "plain nice matrix multiplication". It is left-side vector multiplication of a matrix with an implicit broadcast.
